name: First person template but you can yeet the blue blocks into infinity.
name_original: First person template but you can yeet the blue blocks into infinity.
description:
Video edited on Kapwing

 R to Reset, and the metal blocks can't disappear... or can they?

Video edited on Kapwing

This is my first public crap game, and I made this as a joke. Don't take it seriously because I know I did nothing(Not actually). I still hope you can have fun :D
